name: Hoop Shoot (itch)
description:
This is a simple little game built using jQuery/JS that involves shooting basketballs. 

The aim of the game is to get the highest possible score before the time runs out. The game uses probability based on distance between click and the hoop. the further away you shoot the lower your chance of hitting, but the higher potential point gain!

Click the screen to shoot the ball!

Comment below if you beat my high score of 71
